testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator light ON check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position using ignition key.

testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator light (1) come on?

action.ptxt: Check if DTC P1636 and/or P1638 are detected by ECM referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check . If detected, perform the troubleshooting referring to the corresponding flowchart in this section. If not detected, go to Immobilizer Indicator Light Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine Stop .

testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator light flash check
testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator light flash on and off continuously in Step 1?

action.ptxt: Check what DTC is detected by ECM referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check . Then, perform the troubleshooting referring to the corresponding flowchart in this section.
Perform Engine and Emission Control System Check .

testgroup.title: Immobilizer indicator light remain ON check

test1.ptxt: Check if immobilizer indicator light remains ON after engine start.

testgroup.question: Does immobilizer indicator light remain ON after engine start?

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Indicator Light Remains ON after Engine Start .
Immobilizer control system is in good condition. Then, go to Keyless Start System Check for the vehicle with keyless start system.
